name: Q-Boy
storyline: Far away in the Q Galaxy, there is a glittering planet where lives numerous odd animals. For having the Rainbow-Flower, animals there all have happy and peaceful lives. However, good times don't last long. A bad guy named Dr. Mouse comes and takes the Rainbow-Flower away. He establishes a base there and tries to rule the world with the Rainbow-Flower. At this critical time, here comes the brave Q~Boy. Can he help the animals to defeat Dr. Mouse and find the Rainbow-Flower back again?
summary: Q-Boy is an unlicensed platform video game developed and published by Thin Chen Enterprise/Sachen, released for the Family Computer in March 5 1994. Not to be confused with the Famiclone game console of the same title.
